name: Sword and Shield: Arena VR
description:
Sword Fighting in Virtual Reality against realistic human opponents with advanced sword and shield physics. The weapons are sword and shield from the Viking Period of European History around 800 a.d. You will be challenged by many opponents. Good choice for your exercise in VR - very fun Cardio Workout.

In addition to the standard smooth slide navigation, the game also offers a unique navigation as running in place that gives you great opportunity to exercise and use it as your workout.
